%vlocity_namespace%__Author__c: Florida Department of Children and Families

value.query:
SELECT Id, Message__c, Status__c, Priority__c,related_to__c from Alert__c WHERE Status__c = 'Created'
and related_to__c in 
(SELECT id FROM Contact WHERE Id in (SELECT %vlocity_namespace%__contactid__c
FROM %vlocity_namespace%__PartyRelationship__c WHERE (%vlocity_namespace%__SourcePartyId__c = 'a2b3i000000PY3WAAW' AND %vlocity_namespace%__TargetRole__c = 'Foster Child')))
